This is a **dummy welcome page** created with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/), an open-source scientific and technical publishing system.

## What is Quarto?

Quarto enables you to create dynamic documents, presentations, websites, and more using Markdown, code, and computational output.

## Basic Features

- **Markdown Support:**\
Write content using simple and readable Markdown syntax.
- **Code Execution:**\
Embed code chunks in R, Python, Julia, and more.
- **Interactive Visualizations:**\
Integrate interactive plots and widgets.
- **Multiple Output Formats:**\
Render to HTML, PDF, MS Word, slides, and more.
